author: rcm
msg: Simplified TOS so that it maintains the adapters throughout its life.  Created a new OS (from the existing TOS) that will store object data and recreate objects after a reset.

author: rcm
msg: Converted OS exception into a runtime exception.

author: rcm
msg: update() now adds changed object to a DirtyObjectSet allowing views to be refreshed where objects have changed.

author: rcm
msg: Reorganised SkylarlkViewer so the update notifer can be injected into it.  This is needed when running in C/S mode as updates need to come across the wire and the views need to be updated.
